metadata.title: CVE-2022-30768 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) issue in ZoneMinder 1.36.12 allows anattacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via the Username field when anAdmin (or non-Admin users that can see other users logged into theplatform) clicks on Logout. NOTE: this exists in later versions thanCVE-2019-7348 and requires a different attack method.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
